name: Kingdom of Nyabur
description:
Kingdown of Nyabur is a classic RPG that will make you relive your nostalgia for the classic RPG of the 90s. This nostalgia is a constant source of motivation for Kingdom of Nyabur.
Our goal is to create a classic RPG experience that is acceptable to a modern, older audience. With familiar gameplay, this 10 hour game will remind you of a game experience like Final Fantasy or Golden Sun.

This story takes place in the Kingdom of Nyabur.
While Prince Arvin, future heir to the throne, fled his responsibilities to embark on the adventure more than a year ago.
He was found by his friend and weapon master, Jeanna and Edouard, the army commander.
Both had been instructed by the king to find his son.
The prince had to return to the country of emergency, because the king had a mysterious message to send him.
Arvin didn’t know this yet, but his fate was about to change...

Kingdown of Nyabur is that they offer you a varied game play with an entertaining humor.

Combat System

  • A dynamic turn-based combat system, with strategies to defeat monsters or bosses.
  • Defeat your enemies using unique attacks specific to each member of the group.
  • Unleash devastating  ultimate attacks
  • Summon different monsters and entities to help you in your fight.

Skills Learning System

  • A unique skill learning system has each character through a point system.

Day \ Night System

  • You will find different NPC(s) depending if it is day or night

Mini-games

  • Play mini-games to earn rewards for the luckiest or most skilled among you.

Fishing system

  • Fish with a unique fishing system and collect them.

Engage in various secondary quests

  • Explore the world to unlock hidden places, characters, objects and more.

XBOX OR PS GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED !
The English version is coming soon !
